title: Unique Light Architecture | Famous Dutch Designers
text: Large showroom 3000m² in Almere-Buiten Customer Satisfaction Customers rate us 4.6/5 Free Shipping Within the Netherlands on orders over €150- Fast Delivery Within 1-3 working days Featured Maretti lights Stylish and functional lighting that perfectly fits into any interior, catering to both residential and business customers. Visit our showroom! Come for inspiration, advice from our account managers, or to discuss a lighting plan at our showroom. Our Customers We offer lighting solutions for every industry, from hair salons and hotels to cafeterias. Among our clients are top companies such as BAM, Van der Valk, and Oger. For consumers, we provide a wide range of lighting options, from residential to bathroom lighting. Collections by Dutch Designers Illuminate your interior with exclusive collections from top designers such as Eric Kuster, Piet Boon, and Marcel Wolterinck, and enjoy unique Dutch designs. Maretti's Top 10 Recommendations Our personal top 10 has been carefully curated from a selection of pendant lamps, floor lamps, table lamps, and more, each excelling in their own way in style, innovation, and craftsmanship.
